special_powers.name: HELLFIRE GALA
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when a friendly character with the X-Men keyword attacks and the attack roll includes exactly one 5, you may replace the other die with a 5.

special_powers.name: HIGH FASHION: TELEKINETIC FLOATING X HEADPIECE
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword hits and a 5-5 was rolled, after resolutions give an action token to each hit character.

special_powers.name: IMPLANTED IDEAS
special_powers.description: Mind Control. When Jean Grey uses it, after resolutions deal a hit character damage equal to its printed damage value.

special_powers.name: HIGH FASHION: RAINBOW JACKET WITH ALL-BLACK SUIT AND FEDORA
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword hits and a 5-5 was rolled, after resolutions choose a standard power a friendly character with the X-Men keyword has on their card. If you did, Synch can use the chosen power until the end of your next turn.

special_powers.name: COORDINATING OUTFITS AND POWERS
special_powers.description: Perplex. When Synch uses it to target a friendly character, if that character has a High Fashion trait, the next time that character hits this turn they can use their High Fashion trait regardless of the attack result.
